project.description: Build clovr-standard image and upload to Amazon EC2

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt export BUILD_ID=$BUILD_ID sudo -u www-data -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-build $IMAGE_NAME clovr-standard if [ $? = 0 ] then bldimgname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'` curl http://localhost:8888/job/Bundle%20ec2%20image/buildWithParameters?IMAGE_NAME=/mnt/clovr-standard-$bldimgname fi
